name: Blueprint to Product
description: Transform technical blueprints into fully assembled products with stunning 3D effects

metadata.visual_description: From an old leather-bound book illustration of a vintage pocket watch, golden gears rise and assemble into a ticking luxury timepiece, glowing with precision.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on gears ‚Üí orbit as they assemble ‚Üí hero shot of complete timepiece
metadata.lighting: dramatic golden highlights, metallic reflections, deep shadows
metadata.environment: dim mahogany desk, glowing gears floating in mid-air
elements: ancient leather book with pocket watch sketch
gears, cogs, springs assembling in the air
gold and steel watch case forming
metadata.sfx: metallic ticks, gear clicks, winding spring
metadata.music: luxury orchestral score with deep strings and brass
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on a sketched pocket watch. The ink begins to shimmer in gold.
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Golden gears float upward, locking into place with precision, forming a watch body.
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Fully formed watch hovers above the book, its hands ticking with glowing precision.
metadata.camera_5_8s: wide hero shot with golden reflections
metadata.cta_motion: watch freezes mid-air, golden flare reveals brand name
metadata.cta_style: engraved metallic typography glowing in gold

metadata.visual_description: From automotive design blueprints on an illuminated desk, carbon fiber panels and chrome engine rise and assemble into a roaring supercar with glowing headlights.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on blueprints ‚Üí orbit around assembling engine ‚Üí hero shot of complete supercar
metadata.lighting: dramatic studio lighting, chrome reflections, blue accent lights
metadata.environment: engineer's desk with illuminated blueprints, parts floating with precision
elements: V12 engine block with chrome finish
metadata.sfx: engine roar, hydraulic assembly, metal snapping
metadata.music: aggressive orchestral with powerful brass and percussion
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on automotive blueprints. Technical lines pulse with electric blue energy.
metadata.audio_0_2s: blueprint paper unfolding + distant engine hum
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Engine components and carbon fiber panels float upward, locking together with hydraulic precision.
metadata.camera_2_5s: orbit macro around assembling engine and chassis
metadata.audio_2_5s: hydraulic assembly sounds + metal snapping into place
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Completed supercar rotates slowly, headlights flare, engine roars with visible exhaust heat.
metadata.camera_5_8s: wide hero shot with dramatic lighting
metadata.cta_motion: car freezes with headlight flare revealing brand name
metadata.cta_style: sleek modern typography with motion blur and chrome finish

metadata.visual_description: From holographic circuit board schematics floating above a tech lab, nano chips and OLED display rise and assemble into a flagship smartphone with holographic interface.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on circuits ‚Üí orbit around assembling components ‚Üí hero shot of complete phone
metadata.lighting: clean white lighting with cyan accents, holographic glow
metadata.environment: clean tech lab table, holographic displays, components floating with precision
metadata.sfx: electronic beeps, magnetic snaps, capacitor charging
metadata.ambience: high-tech lab atmosphere with subtle electric hum
metadata.music: minimalist electronic score with digital textures
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on holographic circuit schematics. Pathways pulse with cyan electricity.
metadata.camera_0_2s: close push-in on glowing circuit patterns
metadata.audio_0_2s: electronic initialization beeps + data processing sounds
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Nano chips magnetize together, display layers align perfectly, titanium frame segments lock.
metadata.audio_2_5s: magnetic assembly snaps + capacitor charging sounds
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Phone powers on with boot sequence, holographic interface projects above screen.
metadata.camera_5_8s: wide hero shot with holographic effects
metadata.audio_5_8s: boot-up chime sequence + digital orchestral swell
metadata.cta_motion: phone hovers with holographic brand name projection
metadata.cta_style: futuristic holographic text with digital distortion effects

metadata.visual_description: From ancient Cybertronian schematics with glowing alien symbols, armor plates and energon core rise and assemble into a massive Transformer robot in battle stance.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on alien symbols ‚Üí orbit around transforming parts ‚Üí hero shot of battle-ready robot
metadata.lighting: dramatic lighting with blue energy accents, energon core glow
metadata.environment: metallic tablet with ancient symbols, parts transforming with energy crackling
elements: ancient Cybertronian tablet with glowing symbols
energon core igniting with blue flame
metadata.sfx: metallic transformation, servo whirs, energon humming, weapon charging
metadata.ambience: alien technology atmosphere with energy crackling
metadata.music: epic orchestral with electronic elements and robotic themes
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on Cybertronian schematics. Alien symbols pulse with blue energon energy.
metadata.camera_0_2s: close push-in on glowing alien symbols
metadata.audio_0_2s: alien technology activation + energon core startup
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Armor plates transform and lock with precision, servo motors whir, energon core ignites.
metadata.audio_2_5s: metallic transformation sounds + servo motor whirs
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Robot stands heroically, arm transforms to plasma cannon, optical sensors flash blue.
metadata.camera_5_8s: wide hero shot with dramatic energy effects
metadata.audio_5_8s: weapon charging + brief robotic voice + orchestral climax
metadata.cta_motion: robot strikes heroic pose with energy surge revealing brand name
metadata.cta_style: cybernetic glowing blue typography with circuit line patterns

metadata.visual_description: From Leonardo da Vinci's mechanical sketches on aged parchment, bronze gears and crystal orbs rise and assemble into an intricate time travel device with swirling temporal energy.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on da Vinci sketches ‚Üí orbit around floating clockwork ‚Üí hero shot of completed time machine
metadata.lighting: warm candlelight with blue temporal energy, brass reflections, swirling time distortions
metadata.environment: Renaissance workshop with ancient manuscripts, floating gears casting shadows, temporal ripples in air
elements: ornate time dial with moving hands
metadata.sfx: clockwork ticking, gear mechanisms, temporal energy humming, crystal resonance
metadata.ambience: ancient workshop atmosphere with mystical energy
metadata.music: orchestral with clockwork rhythm and mystical themes
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on da Vinci's sketches. Ink lines begin to glow with temporal blue energy.
metadata.camera_0_2s: close push-in on glowing mechanical drawings
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Bronze gears and crystal orbs float upward, clockwork mechanisms interlocking with precise clicks, temporal core igniting.
metadata.camera_2_5s: orbit macro around assembling clockwork with blue energy trails
metadata.audio_2_5s: gear clicking + crystal resonance + temporal energy building
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Complete time machine activates, temporal vortex swirls, time dials spin rapidly, reality ripples around device.
metadata.camera_5_8s: wide hero shot with temporal distortion effects
metadata.audio_5_8s: temporal activation surge + orchestral crescendo + time ripple effects
metadata.cta_motion: time machine creates temporal rift revealing brand name through time distortion
metadata.cta_style: renaissance brass typography with temporal glow effects

metadata.visual_description: From scientific DNA helix diagrams on laboratory charts, glowing genetic strands unwind and reassemble into a sophisticated nanoscale medical robot with precision mechanical components.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on DNA diagrams ‚Üí dive into molecular level ‚Üí pullback to reveal nano robot
metadata.lighting: clean laboratory lighting with bioluminescent DNA glow, laser precision beams
metadata.environment: high-tech medical laboratory, holographic displays, molecular diagrams floating in air
metadata.sfx: molecular assembly sounds, precision micro-mechanics, electronic beeps, DNA strand separation
metadata.ambience: sterile laboratory with subtle electronic hum
metadata.music: minimalist electronic with biological rhythm patterns
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on DNA structure diagrams. Genetic sequences begin to glow and separate into base pairs.
metadata.camera_0_2s: close push-in on glowing molecular structure
metadata.audio_0_2s: laboratory equipment humming + molecular vibration sounds
metadata.timeline_2_5s: DNA strands unwind and transform into mechanical components, nano-scale robot parts assembling with atomic precision.
metadata.audio_2_5s: molecular assembly + precision micro-mechanics + electronic assembly
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Complete nano-robot activates, microscopic tools extend, bioluminescent energy pulses through structure, ready for medical mission.
metadata.camera_5_8s: dramatic microscopic to macro reveal of functioning nano-robot
metadata.audio_5_8s: system activation + medical scanner beeps + electronic orchestral swell
metadata.cta_motion: nano-robot projects holographic brand name through laser scanning beam
metadata.cta_style: holographic medical typography with DNA helix patterns

metadata.visual_description: From medieval bestiary illustrations on ancient parchment, steel plates and hydraulic mechanisms rise and assemble into a massive mechanical dragon with glowing eyes and fire-breathing capability.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up on bestiary drawings ‚Üí orbit around assembling steel dragon ‚Üí epic wide shot of complete mechanical beast
metadata.lighting: forge fire lighting with steel reflections, glowing mechanical eyes, flame illumination
metadata.environment: medieval forge workshop, ancient manuscripts, floating steel plates with sparks flying
metadata.sfx: heavy metal assembly, hydraulic mechanisms, mechanical roars, forge fire crackling
metadata.ambience: medieval forge atmosphere with dragon mechanical sounds
metadata.music: epic orchestral with medieval themes and mechanical rhythms
metadata.timeline_0_2s: Macro focus on medieval dragon illustration. Ancient ink begins to smolder and transform into glowing steel.
metadata.camera_0_2s: close push-in on transforming bestiary drawing
metadata.audio_0_2s: parchment crackling with forge fire + distant mechanical rumbling
metadata.timeline_2_5s: Steel plates and hydraulic joints float upward, assembling into dragon form with mechanical precision, joints locking with powerful clicks.
metadata.camera_2_5s: dynamic orbit around massive assembling dragon structure
metadata.audio_2_5s: heavy metal clanking + hydraulic assembly + mechanical joint locks
metadata.timeline_5_8s: Complete mechanical dragon rears up, eyes glow with inner fire, spreads steel wings, breathes flames with mechanical roar.
metadata.camera_5_8s: epic wide hero shot with dragon spreading wings and breathing fire
metadata.audio_5_8s: mechanical dragon roar + wing deployment + flame burst + orchestral climax
metadata.cta_motion: dragon breathes fire that forms brand name in flames before cooling to steel letters
metadata.cta_style: forged steel typography with flame effects and medieval ornamentation
